articles.author: Cara Anna, Josh Boak
articles.title: $1 billion gets a permanent seat on Trump's Board of Peace for Gaza, as India and others invited - AP News
articles.description: At least eight more countries say the United States has invited them to join President Donald Trump’s new Board of Peace overseeing next steps for Gaza. A U.S. official confirms that a $1 billion contribution secures permanent membership, while a three-year a…
articles.content: At least eight more countries say the United States has invited them to join President Donald Trumps Board of Peace, a new body of world leaders meant to oversee next steps in Gaza that shows ambitio… [+3905 chars]
